message: I'm being generous in this first round, Bob. Let's see if we can reach a fair agreement!
Let's be reasonable, Alice.  The clock is ticking.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob, but I need a fairer share than your last offer. Let's work together to make this happen.
This is a fair deal, Alice.  Don't let the opportunity slip away.
Bob, time is running out. Let's split the money evenly and avoid the risk of getting nothing at all.
